p: Zolfi et al. [ 44] and Alizadeh-Sani et al. [ 66] had prepared the WPI-based coating films with TiO 2 NPs. The preparation of WPI/cellulose nanofibers (CNFs) with TiO 2 NPs was introduced by Alizadeh-Sani et al. [ 66] as follows. Firstly, TiO 2 NPs were added to WPI/CNFs solutions with stirring and sonication. Then, rosemary essential oil (REO) was added to the composite film solution and homogenized for 10 min. WPI/CNFs suspension with TiO 2 NPs and REO were cast onto a petri dish and then dried using vacuum oven at 30 ± 1 °C and 50 ± 6% RH for 24 h.
